text:
Awesome game! :D
But an apology is in order...
When I first saw the pics of the game before being released...I doubted Miyamoto -_-
Then I saw a trailer and my spirit was lifted, then I bought it and played it and gone were the doubts!
Never again will I do the same mistake!

text:
This game recieves a lot of stick for being too easy, or not being dark enough for a Zelda game, too kiddy etc.
I absolutely loved this game, the characters were charming, the cel shaded graphics made it so stylish and different to it's predecessors and I loved the music. One of the reasons that I feel the gamecube is greater than the playstation 2 :).
